Meet Team LakeSwag

Motivated and ready to produce apparel to help you remember your favorite times at the lake

Andrew Hendricks

Creater/ CEO

Stephen Phillips

Creator/ CTO

Lake Swag is a marketing and merchandising company driven to deliver top quality apparel. Our company was started around a camprise on Silver Lake in Wautoma, WI. With families that have been coming up to Silver Lake for over 100 years, we wanted to create apparel that reminds us of our time on the lake.

Some of our work

Copyright © LakeSwag 2020

Silvercryst

Helped create shirts for silvercrest

• Sold over 200 tshirts to Silvercryst
• First batch of 100 was over 75% sold in the first week
• Numerous social media posts
• Created new and hip designs

  • Date: June 2019 - Present
  • Company: Silvercryst
  • Category: Restaurant Apparel

SkiBuds

Provided apparel for stephens app to find skiers and snowboarders to ride with

• Ordered and distributed over 130,000 (70,000 for next season) stickers while testing from over 5 suppliers
• Produced over 500 shirts, getting samples from over 10 suppliers
• Have produced hats from several suppliers (over 200 hats)
• Have produced many flags

  • Date: December 2019 - Present
  • Company: SkiBuds
  • Category: Corporate Apparel
